EMICautionPart1.text: I would like to inform you that your E M I for the month is due on

EMICautionPart2.text: . Please confirm if you have sufficient balance in your account for clearance ?

AskPaymentDate.text: When will you be funding your account? Today? Tomorrow ? else please specify a date?

ThankYouPenaltyInfoExit.text: Thankyou for your response. Request you to please update your account at the earliest else delay will lead to an accrual of a bounce charge of Rs 350 and further delay in EMI payment can lead to levy of penalty as well. Hope you understand

ThankYouExit.text: Thank you very much and have a great day.

CustomerConfirmationPart1.text: Good Morning, I am Riya calling from Ameyo. Am I speaking to

WrongCustomer.text: Sorry, for your inconvenience. Have a great day ahead.

EMIMissPart1.text: You have missed making a payment towards your E M I for the month of

PaymentOnlineOffline.text: Thankyou. Please confirm how you shall be making this payment, online? visiting the branch?

OnlinePaymentPortal.text: What mode will you use to pay, Paytm, U P I, N E F T?

ThankYouHeavyPenaltyInfoExit.text: Thank You very much for the response. I have msged you the link through which you can make an online payment. Request you not to delay the payment as the same will lead to a levy of penalty charge. Thank You very much for your cooperation and have a great day.

BranchPayment.text: Thank you for confirming you will pay at our branch, and have a great day ahead .

FollowupAskPaymentDate.text: . Please confirm when you will be making this payment. Today, tomorrow or else please specify a date.

9ed6d727dd54ddde3201c43bac26feab.text: Thank you very much and have a great day
